name: King Randall's Party
blurb: King Randall's Party is a side-scrolling fortress defense game. Build your castle, defend it from your enemies, and protect the gold!

rewards.reward: MY SINCERE THANKS =========================== Thank you for helping make King Randall's Party a reality!\r\n=========================== All higher reward tiers receive this too.

INTO THE CREDITS WITH YOU! 
===========================
Your name or alias will be added to the credits, and you can submit a shout-out that will appear next to your name in the credits. (Obviously nothing vulgar or inappropriate). 
===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
===========================
Be one of the first ones to back us and get the $20 reward tier for $15!
===========================
Add $5 to this tier to get the Beta Buddy benefits.

PLAYER OF GAMES
===========================
Sweet! You get the full, DRM-Free digital copy of the game, and free updates for life! Get ready to party! ===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

BETA BUDDY + SOUNDTRACK (Cond.)
=========================== 
You will get super sweet, early access to a Beta version of the game With that access you'll be able to play the game and suggest changes that may make it into the final version of the game. 

Along with the game, you will also receive access to the exclusive beta section of our forums.

Also, if we reach our first stretch goal for sweet, honey sweet custom soundtrack, you will get a digital copy!

===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

NAMER OF NAMES
===========================
The King's troops have names. Perhaps... YOUR names! Donate at this level and one of the kings troops will have your name, and will be listed in the obituaries at the end of every level. (Limited to realistic, appropriate names).

You will also get to write a one-liner/obituary for the character, which will also appear next to that character on the victory screen. 
===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

King's Man/King's Lady ===========================
Receive a hand written, personalized message from the King, or any of the other characters. Probably complaining about the current state of things. Maybe (probably) blaming you.

I will snail mail this letter to you so that you have a sweet memento of how you helped back the game. 
===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

CRYPT DWELLER
===========================
About 5 of the levels in King Randall's Party will take place in a Graveyard. Those graves are going to need some names on them! Could be yours... for a price. But it's not enough to slap your name on the gravestone - why don't you help us design it!?

You don't need to be good at drawing or design to enjoy this reward tier! Enjoyable for adults and kids. See the rewards section of the description for more information.
===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

HOME DECORATOR
===========================
About 5 of the levels in King Randall's Party will take place in a Village. These houses are fresh off the production lot and need some personalization... a fresh, gamers touch. YOUR touch! Help design one of the houses that will appear in the village!

You don't need to be good at drawing or design to enjoy this reward tier! Enjoyable for adults and kids. See the rewards section of the description for more information.
===========================
Due to implementation cost, this reward is unique to this tier and the highest donation tier. See the rewards section for more information on how to purchase this reward if it has run out, or you want to donate at a higher tier and also receive this reward.

COLLECTOR'S COLLECTOR
===========================
 Get the exclusive Royal Treasury Edition of the game! Play it, put it on your shelf. Rub it all over your belly if you want. I won't judge you (much). Comes with a lightscribed DVD copy of the game, and Official Soundtrack (if stretch goal met). This is a Kickstarter exclusive - no one else will ever get their hands on this.
===========================
All higher reward tiers receive this too.

STYLIN!
===========================
Cover that beautiful body of yours... with our amazing Gorilla Tactic's t-shirt AND Sweatshirt! You'll be enjoying all of the other amazing rewards you'll have, but you'll also look good doing it!
=========================== All higher reward tiers receive this too.

PROJECTILE DESIGNER
===========================
Catapults can fling many things at the enemies. Sometimes it can fling enemies at the enemies. But what about... oh, I don't know. But maybe you do! Pledge at this level and you can work directly with me to design one of the projectiles that the catapult will throw. King Randall's Party is a humorous game, so there are a lot of options...
=========================== Due to implementation cost, this reward is unique to this tier and the highest donation tier. See the rewards section for details on how to receive this reward if we have run out or you are donating at another tier.

STYLIN!
===========================
Cover that beautiful body of yours... with our amazing King's Party t-shirt AND Gorilla Tactics Sweatshirt! You'll be enjoying all of the other amazing rewards you'll have, but you'll also look good doing it!
=========================== All higher reward tiers receive this too.

SUPREME PARTY-GOER
===========================
We will immortalize a portrait of you in the art style of King Randall's Party and provide you a high resolution digital copy. ALSO! Because that isn't enough, every time someone starts King Randall's Party, I will show a stylist splash screen with a random Party-Goer's stylized portrait, a personalized thank you message, and a message of your choosing!
=========================== All higher reward tiers receive this too.

CREATOR OF WORLDS
===========================
Ever play a game and wonder, "It would be really cool if this game had a level in XYZ environment!" Well wish no more! Work directly with me to design the environment for several of the games levels to take place in (within theme and storyline limits). This is a really special reward tier, because everyone who plays the game will play levels in an environment that you had a direct hand in crafting.
=========================== All higher reward tiers receive this too.

YOU ARE THE HERO
===========================
You're basically paying for half the game here. Let's be honest, this game is now partially about you. So let's not goof around - I'm gonna add you to the game as the protagonist. Everyone who plays the game will be able to choose if they want to play the original Royal Treasurer, or as a stylized version of you. 
Shiz just got real.
===========================
You get all the rewards, even the limited ones.
